cz.vutbr.fit.pdb.ateam.tasks

Class AsyncTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.String>
      • cz.vutbr.fit.pdb.ateam.tasks.AsyncTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Boolean>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Boolean>

    public abstract class AsyncTask
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.String>
    This is abstract class representing an asynchronous task that requires a longer execution time.

    To use this Async task you have to override doInBackground() void method. Content of this method is executed on a separate thread. While executing doInBackground method a dialog with cancel btn is shown.

    Author:
    Tomas Hanus, Tomas Mlynaric

      • setErrorCode

        protected void setErrorCode(int errorCode)
        When error code inside background thread, we can push it to method onDone(boolean) Later code rewrite earliers!
        Parameters:
        errorCode - any code related with caller (e.g. DB error code)
